item.description:
Did you know clutter is ALIVE? And it feeds on energy and your feelings of self-worth? Although clutter is "equal opportunity" and can affect anyone. If you would like to learn more about the spiritual side of clutter, this meeting is for you.

The Reverend Todd Miller, Episcopal priest and rector of Trinity Parish will lead the discussion. A young, energetic and soulful man, I (Marilyn) have personally found his sermons to be life-changing. No matter what your beliefs, you will come away energized with new revelations.

Quick test for spiritual clutter:

  • When I look at my physical clutter, do I understand how my mindset, emotions, and lack of self-nurturing have contributed to the mess around me?
  • Do I understand the interconnection between the physical clutter in my life and the mental, emotional, and spiritual issues that are present?
  • Do I have a hard time breaking habits that no longer serve me?


Hope to see you there!
__________________________

7:00-7:30 pm - Socializing (please bring your own goodies if you want any!). I might bring a digital camera to post a photo of the meeting on our Meetup web site IF participants grant permission (please notify me of any privacy concerns).

7:30~8:30 pm - "Exploring the Spiritual Side of Clutter"
The Reverend Todd Miller, Episcopal priest and rector of Trinity Parish

~8:30-9:00 pm - Sharing of decluttering successes and inspirations, group problem-solving, buddying up, + input to future Meetups: group SUCCESSION, future meeting topics and schedule, venue, speakers, organizers, activities, resources: how best to help YOU?

Parking available close by: On street parking is available on Homer Street, on the next block of Center Street just before Bow Street, and on Furber Lane behind the church.

Public transportation: Take the Riverside (Green) line to Newton Centre. Pickup at 6:50 pm from Newton Centre MBTA station and drop-off there again after the meeting, if needed, for those who make prior arrangements with our Assistant Organizer, Marilyn.

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: Exploring the Spiritual Side of Clutter
